publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2761 Mr Brian Monteith: Appointment of Berti Vogts as National Football Coach—That the Parliament welcomes the appointment by the Scottish Football Association of Berti Vogts as the new Scotland coach; recognises the experience and quality that he will bring to the task, having managed his native country’s team to international footballing success, and extends its best wishes both to Mr Vogts and to the national team for their match on 27 March 2002 against the World Cup holders and for a successful campaign to qualify for Euro 2004 in Portugal. Supported by: Fiona Hyslop*
